text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Fellow Americans, doctors and nurses, our healthcare workers, essential workers, grocery store workers, transportation, postal workers, utilities, police, and more are dying because of trumps inaction. Too little too late. He FAILED.  #TRUMPFAILED #covid19
